name: The Savage Firmament
description:
Welcome to The Savage Firmament, a 3D Space Shooter!

You are a spaceship flying through an asteroid field. Try to defeat as many enemies as possible before they destroy you!

CONTROLS:

  • W: Boosters (Speed up)
  • S: Brakes (Slow down)
  • A & D: Roll left and right
  • Mouse: Aim and steer
  • Left-click: Fire
  • Q: Lock-on
  • L: Lock Cursor
  • C: Drift free cursor back to center.
  • +/-: Increase/Decrease camera follow distance.

If you'd like to give some feedback for the game, please fill out a quick survey below!

<<< Play Testing Feedback >>>

(If you experience your camera spinning out of control, try to bring your cursor to the center of the screen or press C to drift it back to the center. This game is recommended to be played in full-screen, so click the full-screen button in the bottom-right!)
